statements: SELECT * FROM Accommodations;
SELECT id, name FROM Accommodations WHERE impact_score > 50;
SELECT name, location FROM Accommodations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Accommodations WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%';
SELECT id, location FROM Accommodations WHERE location = 'Mountain Resort';
SELECT name, location FROM Accommodations WHERE impact_score > 50 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM Accommodations WHERE location LIKE '%beach%'
SELECT id, name, location FROM Accommodations WHERE impact_score < 30 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT name, location, impact_score FROM Accommodations WHERE impact_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY impact_score DESC
SELECT id, impact_score, name, location FROM Accommodations
SELECT * FROM accommodation;
SELECT name, location FROM accommodation;
SELECT capacity, ratings FROM accommodation WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT * FROM accommodation WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT id, carbon_footprint, electricity_usage FROM environmental_impact;
SELECT * FROM accommodation ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(ratings) AS avg_rating, location FROM accommodation GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(ratings) > 4;

SELECT accommodation.name, environmental_impact.carbon_footprint FROM accommodation JOIN environmental_impact ON accommodation.id = environmental_impact.accommodation_id WHERE environmental_impact.carbon_footprint > 1000;

SELECT accommodation.name, SUM(environmental_impact.water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM accommodation JOIN environmental_impact ON accommodation.id = environmental_impact.accommodation_id GROUP BY accommodation.name HAVING SUM(environmental_impact.water_usage) > 500;

SELECT accommodation.name, accommodation.capacity, environmental_impact.electricity_usage FROM accommodation JOIN environmental_impact ON accommodation.id = environmental_impact.accommodation_id WHERE accommodation.capacity < 50 ORDER BY environmental_impact.electricity_usage ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT name, rating FROM accommodations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT impact_id, energy_consumption, waste_generated FROM environmental_impact WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY impact_id ASC;
SELECT monitoring_id, score, comments FROM sustainability_monitoring WHERE score >= 4 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM accommodations ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, location, rating FROM accommodations WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT a.name, e.date, m.score FROM accommodations a INNER JOIN environmental_impact e ON a.accommodation_id = e.accommodation_id INNER JOIN sustainability_monitoring m ON e.impact_id = m.impact_id WHERE e.waste_generated < 100 ORDER BY m.score ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.name, e.energy_consumption, e.waste_generated, e.water_usage, m.score, m.comments FROM accommodations a, environmental_impact e, sustainability_monitoring m WHERE a.accommodation_id = e.accommodation_id AND e.impact_id = m.impact_id AND m.score >= 8 ORDER BY a.name, e.waste_generated DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.name AS accommodation_name, e.date AS impact_date, m.score AS monitoring_score, m.comments AS monitoring_comments FROM accommodations a INNER JOIN environmental_impact e ON a.accommodation_id = e.accommodation_id INNER JOIN sustainability_monitoring m ON e.impact_id = m.impact_id WHERE e.water_usage > 50 AND m.score < 7 ORDER BY a.name, e.date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT name, city, country FROM accommodations WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT city, rating FROM accommodations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, electricity_consumption, water_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE recycling = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT name, rating FROM accommodations WHERE country = 'France' AND rating > 4.0;
SELECT city, country FROM accommodations ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM accommodations;
SELECT name, carbon_emissions FROM accommodations INNER JOIN carbon_footprint ON accommodations.id = carbon_footprint.accommodation_id;
SELECT name, location, type FROM accommodations;
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM guests;
SELECT check_in, check_out, payment FROM bookings;
SELECT service_name, price, description FROM services;
SELECT overall_rating, cleanliness_rating, service_rating FROM ratings;
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE room_count > 5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, type, room_count FROM accommodations WHERE type = 'Hotel' AND room_count >= 10;
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT accommodation_id, AVG(cleanliness_rating), AVG(service_rating) FROM ratings GROUP BY accommodation_id HAVING AVG(overall_rating) >= 4;
SELECT id, service_name, price FROM services WHERE price <= 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
